Sentencas: More/all-electric aircraft is one of the most promising development directions for aircraft.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: However, the performance of the turbine engine will be strongly affected by the high electric power fraction when the electric power is extracted from the main engine.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In order to improve aero-engine performance and electric power fraction, the turbojet engine integrated with an interstage turbine burner (ITB) and solid oxide fuel cell (ITB-SOFC engine) is proposed in this paper.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Turbojet engine provides thrust for propulsion and SOFC provides electric power for electrical equipment.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the performance of the ITB-SOFC engine, the thermodynamic analysis model of the engine performance is developed.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Analysis results show that the ITB-SOFC engine has advantages in thermal efficiency and specific thrust over the turbojet engine, the increments of these two parameters can reach 2.94% and 23.87% respectively.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: There is a limitation in pressure ratio for the ITB-SOFC engine, which is 24.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The electric power fraction of the ITB-SOFC engine can vary in a wide range.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The specific thrust increment over a turbojet engine is high up to 24.07% if the electric power fraction is high up to 0.2.
Titulo: Performance evaluation of a turbojet engine integrated with interstage turbine burner and solid oxide fuel cell
